website_summaries.verdict: The Altec Lansing BoomBox iMT810's winning combination of good performance, lots of oomph, and portability makes it one of the best boom-box-style bass-heavy speaker options you can buy.
pros: The Altec Lansing Mix BoomBox iMT810 has a distinct, retrolicious design, excellent sound for a system its size, built-in FM radio, two auxiliary inputs placed on the top of the unit for easy access, a portable power option (eight D batteries), and a slot for storing the included remote, which also clips onto a belt
cons: The system is somewhat pricey, has no AM radio or video outputs, and no included rechargeable battery option

customer_reviews.title: poor quality solder joints between AC feed copper wire to ...
customer_reviews.text: Known issue: poor quality solder joints between AC feed copper wire to PCB 'goldfingers' causes intermittent electrical 'opens' and ultimately 100% loss of power (usually just after 1 year warranty expires). Battery source power not adversely affected. Other than that issue, it provides outstanding LOUD and clear sound with ample bass without distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Stevers

customer_reviews.title: ... bought mine in May 2012 and it still works great. Added Bluetooth wireless to it and rechargeable D ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in May 2012 and it still works great. Added Bluetooth wireless to it and rechargeable D batteries. Blows the socks off most everything available on the wireless portable speakers available today in terms of sound quality, loudness, booming bass and ability to have 30pin apple devices along with 2 wired inputs. With the bluetooth added, I can wirelessly connect from Samsung Note 5 as well as Ipad Air 2. Was a steal at $198.00.
customer_reviews.author: TxAgg2011

customer_reviews.title: Loved the sound but as other customers have noted
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sound but as other customers have noted, the box will probably stop working in 12-18 months. This is what happened to us, same issue as everyone else - the AC power cord. I've tried replacement cords and none work. Works fine on expensive D cell batteries but this is a poor solution for anyone who uses the box regularly. What I find amazing is how a product like this gets a 4 star rating with such an obvious mechanical flaw - buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: James Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Device
customer_reviews.text: After searching all over the internet and in countless stores I finally decided to purchase this Boombox for $260 on Amazon. Yes, it is somewhat expensive, but it is worth EVERY penny. It is SO DANG LOUD! Truly marvelous how loud this device can get. The treble is piercing and the bass in fierce. I've gotten so many noise complaints now. It's quite small, portable, it'll charge your iPod/iPhone, you can use input on 3 total devices, the remote is badass, and the radio is an awesome added feature! I highly recommend over ANY Bose or competition speakers!
customer_reviews.author: David O. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sad sad story. Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for awhile. The sound id pretty good, not the best. Good for the size though. And the ipod dock is nice too. The problem is that it stopped working while plugged in to an outlet and only worked with batteries. I tried to get it fixed but there was no refund or help from Altec Lansing..ridiculous. I eventually sold it to a friend who is good with electronics, he fixed it and I got a good deal. My question is why Altec wouldnt fix mine.
customer_reviews.author: BH1900MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: The iMT810 is everything I wanted in a sound system. From the deep base to the crystal clear cimbals you will think you have a recording studio in your home. For the price the sound can't be beat. The sound that comes out of this box, whether from the FM or your iphone is utterly breathtaking. I highly recommend this unit. By the way the cubby for the remote fits perfectly and adds to the look of the unit. The remote is well built and you will fondle it in your hands. It has a good weight and is very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vs iHome iP4GZ Portable FM Stereo Boombox for iPhone/iPod
customer_reviews.text: I bought both of these boom boxes to compare. This one is far superior for a number of reasons. First, the sound is MUCH better. Deeper bass and better mids and highs. The display on this one also shows you the album and song while the iHome just says,"IPOD". The radio has an actual antenna which is nice although the iHome had decent reception regardless. The form factor on the iHome is a little more conventional and easier to tote around but not by a lot. Overall I really love this boom box and think its much better than the iHome.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Trachtman

customer_reviews.title: Really nice Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit this is not nearly as big as I expected, and it certainly won't rock a whole back yard with thunderous sound. However, I'm finding it is really perfect for what I need. It's easy to move around, it is well made and has great balanced sound, all the controls work great, and it's classy and clean looking. Not like the boomboxs with orange lights that bounce all over the place that the kids like. Sure, I would love something to rock the neighborhood, but 95% of the time, I don't have it that loud anyway so it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Menke

customer_reviews.title: Great music player for cookouts and parties
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio to use for frequent neighborhood block parties. This thing was a hit at our last party. It is very easy to use and has great controls. The only thing that I do not like is that most of the controls are on the remote, and there are no redundant controls on the unit itself. This means that if the remote comes up missing, the radio is going to be useless. Overall this is excellent value for the price paid, and much better than the iPod players that I saw for sale in my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W.

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing boombox. I have had it over a year and didnt want to review it right a way as most people give reviews quickly. I did research compared to other boomboxes especially the beatsbox. This unit is awesome. I have used it for surround sound to watch my projector outside. Put this little puppy in a corner and listen to the tone emanating from it. Great base. Over all sound great. For the price it is a steal. Was recieved quickly from amazon.... thid is what amazon is all about
customer_reviews.author: Eightbll

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing iMT810 BoomBox
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research, I found this Boombox fits all the needs I was looking for in a player. It is definitely loud and has really good sound. I have used one set of batteries which are still in the player out at the beach for the last month during weekends. It probably has 30 hours of use with the batteries and they are just showing signs of weakening now. The multiple Aux Inputs are really nice, especially when there is more than one Ipod around. Everyone that has seen and heard this player are really impressed with it. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Quadd

customer_reviews.title: But like many previous reviews
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying, The sound this little thing puts out is tops for its size. I work in a factory and can hear this over the machinery. But like many previous reviews, mine died after about a year and a half. I did some research and found how to fix the power adapter jack. The fix worked and it works just fine again. You can find the fix at imgur.com/a/qDaw4
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm VERY pleased with the performance of this system. I bought it primarily for outdoor functions and it is impressive. Many friends have commented on the quality of the sound produced by this product. It's even better indoors with walls to reflect the sound. The only thing that could be better would be if it would pause the play of the iPod playlist and return to where it left off when switching to a different playlist. It does that if the source is changed from iPod to aux1, aux2, fm, but not between playlists on the iPod. I'm glad I went with this system as opposed to the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Not good for low volume playback
customer_reviews.text: Cool object. Much more compact than I expected. Sturdy. Two drawbacks: 1) Not good at all for playback at low volume (say, in my apartment): the sound results very flat. The problem disappears at higher volume. It is definitely designed for parties and outdoor recreation. 2) A minor one: the remote control works only if you are aligned in front of the boombox. Not from the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro Valli

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We cannot believe how crystal clear and powerful this stereo is. It's not very large, but it is definitely strong. It works great with our iPhone 4S. I know it will be a bit outdated with the new iPhone 5 connector (perhaps they will sell an adapter?). We are very pleased with this stereo and would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Solema

customer_reviews.title: ALTEC Lansing IMT810
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, stop looking. This is the one you want! Powerful clean sound. Small size compared to sound output. EQ. Truly portable. Solid built. I had bought Monster Beats by Dr. Dre at a local retailer and then had read about this online so taking advantage of return times I had both in my possession at the same time side by side playing same music through volume range and ALTEC was better! I returned Monster Beats! I am very pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: but it was an earlier model and it was Great! But
customer_reviews.text: This thing didn't last a day. We had one before, but it was an earlier model and it was Great! But, this one didn't play after 1 day with brand new batteries., nor did it play when plugged into a charger,. It had to have been a lemon. We returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Beachbum

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound, Small Boombox
customer_reviews.text: This system is smaller than I thought it would be, BUT the sound quality and volume is as good, if not better, than my old wired speaker system with a 9" sub-woofer! The bass this box puts out surprised the heck out of me! Pros: Small Portable with up to 30 hours of battery life on 8 D batteries Very loud and in your face Best deal for the price Cons: No audio inputs for AV TV cables No instrument/mic cable inputs (Can't be used as an amp like I'd hoped) Ipod/Iphone sits in the front with only the slide down bar to "protect" and keep it in place while moving it (Recommend removing the device during transport)
customer_reviews.author: big_keato

customer_reviews.title: Altec boombox  best of show
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much read 100+reviews and tested every high-end boombox out there ie; ihome, polk, bang&olaf, JVC kaboom... I needed a portable system that delivered powerful quality sound for home, picnics, beach etc... for the $ there is nothing that compares. Can't imagine needing more wattage, at level 30 (goes to 40) my entire house is getting it. When i take it out to friends, they are simply amazed... BEST OF SHOW! unless you want to spend 2x as much and even then the BO doesn't compete with power factor... tekrek
customer_reviews.author: tekreksd1

customer_reviews.title: This is a rockin' product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 50+ year old rocker who has been disappointed with the new boombox products, but this one leaves me with one word. WOW. The reviews are right - clear treble, non-muddy bass and LOUD. I have no room for a big system any more, so my only choice was a good set of headphones, but this unit will be used at the house, office, traveling, camping, and whatever. Nice size, nice sound at a great price. Bought another for my daughter for High School Graduation. Her and her friends were equally impressed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kopczynski

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Remarkable Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift since I kept reading how great it sounds. It is by far the best sounding boombox I have ever heard and I've been in the Film, TV and Audio business for 25 years. Plus, to be able to direclty plug in your digital music players like iPods and the like, is really genius. I whole-heartedly recommend this product. Happy booming.
customer_reviews.author: DoggyDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Best price/performance out there...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something portable that still had powerful sound for use outdoors and compared many units. It came down to the 810 and the Bose portable and I went with Altec Lansing. While the Bose portable is smaller and delivers good sound, this unit is plenty powerful, has very good sound, and costs half as much. It may be bigger and somewhat bulkier than the Bose, but it's lightweight enough to tote around and the $200 I saved makes it all the more likable. If your looking for a quality, portable sound system that is priced fairly, buy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, nice bottom end bass punch w/ good high end.
customer_reviews.text: Researched these to death...works great with my iphone 4 & ipod with the older style connectors. Havent tried it with iphone 5 yet. Great bass & high end audio. I use it both indoors & outside during pool parties etc... Best unit available anywhere near this price range. Would buy again. Amazon shipped quick, as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Nuclear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a month. I use this when I coach and its loud, has plenty of handles, and is easy to use. The sound quality is great although I find that if it is set on bleachers the base can make the bleachers rattle but that is not the Boombox's fault. It comes with plenty of cords, a back up of the auxiliary cable, and all the settings for the various iPods. Long story short I would buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Best boom box ever!
customer_reviews.text: I researched for a long time and chose this one. It absolutely rocks!! Awesome bass. Great remote control. Great iPod functionality. Great tuner with presets. Two inputs for friends phones to play music. Great sound on battery power. Love it!!! Everyone asks where I got it. Cool looks and very easy to carry too with side and top handles.
customer_reviews.author: A A-Ron

customer_reviews.title: Best boombox for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have the IMT810 since a month.Have started loving this boombox. Also own the Bose Sounddock System. Bose produces a more controlled sound which might be preferred for some music listeners. But for those who want Good bass and power in music, this is the right choice. Plus for the price and the features(Equalizer, FM Radio), I doubt there is any other system at par with this unit. Definitely recommended...
customer_reviews.author: talfred

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based upon the good reviews on the sound quality. Everything said about this unit's sound output is true. Amazing volume out of a small boombox. Unfortunately, the negative reviews that have been posted lately are also true regarding the issues with battery power. After trying several sets of new batteries, my unit would shutoff after 5 -10 minutes of operation. It does work fine on ac power but for me the big selling point of this boombox is it's portability. So, I'm sending it back for a refund. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Trader Gil

customer_reviews.title: Pounding Bass
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this retro looking iPod/ iPhone docking stereo. The bass is kicking the whole time, without the murmur of the typical stereo system. The treble is crisp and clear, even with high volumes, the bass and treble lose no sound quality. This is my second time buying this stereo, the first one is now in my garage still pounding away after a year or more. The price of this stereo blows away any other system for its quality. I checked out a few other stereos before I originally bought this one and I have no regrets. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tismeselfyaknow

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality sound, even when turned up
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for my husband and he loves it. He regularly uses it in the shop while he's working out and brings it outside to listen to while working on whatever construction project he has going on. Luckily, we have a pretty good wi-fi signal so that he is able to put his itouch in the dock and use it to listen to his favorite Pandora stations.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact MP3 boom box
customer_reviews.text: This box is pretty much top of the line in its class, my two boys yanked it out of the box jammed in their Ipod and fired up some "dub step" they immediately started grinning and convulsive dancing at the same time....father bought, teenage approved. It's not cheap, but the sound is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KSmith

customer_reviews.title: After reading how hard some people tried to get in contact with the company I will not even waste my time
customer_reviews.text: used this unit for one summer (imt810) just took it out of the closet for the spring time ,plugged it in and it turn on for 2 seconds and shut off.I tried the d batteries didn't help!! After reading how hard some people tried to get in contact with the company I will not even waste my time,but will never buy anything they make and will tell everyone i know not to purchase there products..PISSED OFF.
customer_reviews.author: jayrose

customer_reviews.title: iMT810
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a music machine that is above and way beyond the multitude of options, you just found it. Everyone that hears it want to know what it is that and where to get it. This system performs just fine in the living room, bedroom, or even in an aircraft hangar bay! Yes, I used the 810 to play music while I played the sax in a hangar bay. The sound is powerful, detailed, clear, not boomy, stuffy, or shrilly. You know what I am talking about. My only con is that I wished it had more preset FM stations. Yes, I do recommend it. Yes, I would buy another one. Money well spent. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel A Morales

customer_reviews.title: Great box
customer_reviews.text: I heard one poolside in Panama City and couldn't believe the sound that it was producing. Was worried about some of the negative feedback with technical issues that people were complaining about, but so far, so good. I have had it since may 2013, and still going good.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This system has a great sound quality to it. I even used it this Halloween to project music at an outdoor party and it doesn't lose any quality at high volumes. Works great on battery power or when plugged in. I love the ipod dock and use it all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for a Portable Stereo
customer_reviews.text: This Altec Lansing stereo works great. I've been using it in my garage, and recently taking it on camping trips. While camping, everyone is amazed at how great the sound is. No complaints about the product at all-maybe except for the battery life. Manual says 30 hours, my first set only lasted about 10 hours. Not that big of a deal to me. The only downside is the price. Fortunately it was on sale when I purchased it and I had a $100 amazon gift card. I would've never bought it for the listed price it goes for.
customer_reviews.author: 2500hd

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a unit like this for an outdoors New Years Eve party, this did not disappoint. If I could improve one thing it would be having a rechargeable battery power supply. Sounds great, packs just enough punch and over all is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: GTR1

customer_reviews.title: Update!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a chance to really play with this device now. The sound is excellent. The bass can really shake the floor. It lacks the ability to plug in headphones. It also lacks the ability to mix from several channels. These two lacks would make this a stellar product n my book. It could also use a subwoofer/speaker out.
customer_reviews.author: åkre

customer_reviews.title: Really good, but some minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: We just bought our second one (the other one is an iMT800, the earlier model). Unfortunately, the AC adapter for the new one was dead on arrival. Have contacted Altec about obtaining a functional one. These boomboxes can really crank out some volume and I have gotten a lot of enjoyment out of the first one, which stays in my shop. The new one will be kept in the house. My only real gripe concerns the AC adapter: Why didn't they just build it into the boombox instead of having it be a separate item to drag around every time the boombox is moved? Would have given 5 stars if not for that design weakness.
customer_reviews.author: Glitch

customer_reviews.title: Worlds best Boom Box!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to have music at an event last summer, and have used it regularly ever since. I was going to wire out door speakers to the stereo in the house, but don't need to now. It works beautifully with any I-Pod, and charges it as well. The sound is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brewski

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Love this dock. Had a few now and this one really pumps. Excellent lows, mids and highs. Good strong, heavy robust quality. Everyone who hears it is amazed. Ideal for outdoor parties. Adjustable bass and treble work well. Combined with the EQ on your device, you can really set the sound to your taste. Definitely recommend this over a Bose sound dock. It is big and heavy with the batteries in, however I found battery life to be excellent 6+ hours at high volumes. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Ellicott

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my teenage daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a small system that she could connect her iPod to and play her music. Her only other request was that it had good bass. This unit has very good sound quality and plenty of low frequency power (i.e., good boom boom).
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: ALTEC LANSING IMT810
customer_reviews.text: I love this boombox. For the price it's great and the quility it just simple awesome. Had it for almost a year now. Brought this with every where bbqs, parks, beach and it's still working. Didn't have 400 dollars to burn on a Dr. Dre but I don't regret at all. With the weather warming up this will be great for yourself or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dondee L. Magnaye

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: This boombox is amazing! Great sound, easy to transport, surprisingly good battery life. Really, really satisfied with this purchase. Great for tailgating (using a power inverter saves some $$$ on D batteries), camping, or doing yard work. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: King of the Lake

customer_reviews.title: Imt810 review
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound in a small boom box package. The base is great. Does not distort even at high volume. I have a very old ipod though and none of the plastic inserts which make it link to the plug on the boom box worked. I inserted it with none, but then the ipod is not secure in the slot. I solved this by putting some self adhesive foam door insulating tape on the back of the ipod and now it rests securely against the boom box slot. Likewise the iphone did not fit securely onto the plug.
customer_reviews.author: haji

customer_reviews.title: It's a good speaker for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good speaker. Sound is clear and bass is good. And, although it's not inexpensive, it's a good price. But, it is not as loud as I wished it to be. I have a very smaller Altec Lansing speaker and when I compared it to this one, the smaller one could have been played more loudly. And I couldn't really hear the difference between bass +0 and the maximum bass. It goes the same for the Treble. So, not very satisfied, but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Good but lacking key feature
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound! My only regret is that it doesn't get used as much since it lacks wireless or blue tooth connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Oneal Rodman

customer_reviews.title: Junk...make sure you buy from an authorized reseller
customer_reviews.text: After 10 months the boombox quit working when connected to power with a cord (it still worked with batteries). I did research and then contacted Altec Lansing and they admitted there was a defect and it would be covered under warranty...that is until they decided that PIXIBYTES was not an "authorized reseller."
customer_reviews.author: TVB

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive sound from such a small device. Best boom box I have ever heard. The Altec Lansing iMT810 Digital Boombox is of very high quality. And I would be proud to recommend this product to anyone looking for great sound.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Timmer

customer_reviews.title: Great little Boombox.
customer_reviews.text: I was fortunate enough to get this boombox during a sale and saved $100 off the regular price. I was not really looking for a boombox, but could not pass up this great deal so I went ahead with my purchase and I'm so glad I did. I have to say that I'm very impressed with the overall build quality and the sound is very good for such a small boombox. My iPhone 4 worked just fine and I didn't have to remove it from it's case to make the connection.
customer_reviews.author: A. HILTUNEN

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding unit! I really like the EQ on this. I also like that it comes with a remote. I give it 5 stars for the sound quality and volume. It would be a bit better if it had a rechargeable battery of some sort but it isn't a deal breaker as I normally have it plugged in with the included power supply. ...It can be powered with standard batteries if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: M.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Boom is right.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable bass for it's size. A great party or work place boom box. Sound quality is really pretty good. Easy to operate with the iPhone. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse111

customer_reviews.title: connection issues
customer_reviews.text: I love this boom box. it has amazing quality sound and looks slick. when I use spotify on the dock mode, it plays one or two songs then stops. and i have to hit play again every time. so i just went to the auxiliary to solve that problem. battery life is a little shorter than i expected. if you plan to use this frequently without an outlet. I would suggest investing in rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: chris alleman

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing Boombox
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that is loud enough for the occasional party both out and inside that was not too expensive. This product has certainly met those needs. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BAF

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: has been working very well for the past few years. Great sound from a small device. Good radio reception and easy to use a smart phone with the jack.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very nice......
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good if not bordering excellent. Unit is pricy and you would expect a way better antenna design from Altac Lansing then just a telescoping P.O.S. design. But who am I to judge.....
customer_reviews.author: slong

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. Docking doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This box sounds great. The only problem I've had with it is the dock has stopped working properly, after only a few months of use from new. It will still charge a phone/ipod in the cradle, but it will not play music from the device while docked. The only way to still use it with an iPod/iPhone is to use one of the aux cables and connect it to one of the aux inputs. Absent this problem, it would be a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: dpas

customer_reviews.title: The next level
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of an iM7, I thought I knew what Altec Lansing could do in this space. I was wrong. Wow. Tight highs; solid bass; volume to spare. The sound is everything you could want. Although the unit has handles, the design doesn't encourage travel. I'll still use my iM7 for sideline duty. (I play Ultimate frisbee.) By far, this is the Ultimate iPod boom box. (Sorry for the pun.)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sounding, high quality boom box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding, high quality boom box!.. the only drawback is the dc adaptor connection is easily subject to damage.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Sanders

customer_reviews.title: great little keyboard amp
customer_reviews.text: got this for my mp3 players also good keyboard amp for in my studio have not moved it around much so cant say if the power pack plug will break or not.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmic Man

customer_reviews.title: customer service
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy altec lansing.I have the imt810,the lcd screen went blank after 18 months.Customer service stinks.after the warranty is over there is no way to service the unit.So if you buy it and it breaks dowm after the warranty is over you are out of luck.I have been unable to find repair service.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE S GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal sound........exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to get home from work...sit on my deck...and listen to my boom-box! The sound from my Altec boombox is better than my home stereo...even FM radio goes to a new level of sound! I LOVE my boombox. It is the best purchase I've made all year! Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: RICK

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Received mine yesterday. Fast shipping and everything as advertised. Can really turn up the volume and bass sounds fantastic. A wonderful product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: After searching and reading reviews I settled for the IMT810. I am playing music with my IPOD right now and it sounds great. I am using this at my office but will be using it at home on the deck and for beach trips. It is LOUD and crisp. Sounds just as good as my neighbors BOSE which cost twice as much. You can't go wrong with this music box. Great Buy IMHO...
customer_reviews.author: C. Carter

customer_reviews.title: ALTEC Lansing iMT810
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ALTEC Lansing iMT810 because my son has the iMT 800 and I fell in love with the sound. I plan on using it at the pool this summer and when I have cookouts.
customer_reviews.author: wanz

customer_reviews.title: A Gift recieved rave reviews
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift. It is used in the kitchen and it's reported that the sound is pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.author: Buys A lot

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Expectation!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond Expectation! indeed ... I was really thinking about buying the Portable Boss system,its good that I didn't my Brother has The Boss and I have tried it it was very good, Not as good as the Altec Lansing 810. I was shocked from the clarity of the treble and the awesome Bass. The batteries stay for a long time, More than one Month of almost every day use of 1 -2 hours in the Morning. I just Love it , I highly recommend it. cheers!
customer_reviews.author: SouthAfrica7

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing iMT 810
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome.Currently sitting on my kitchen counter top where it is used more than my large speaker system.It will be great for our crab parties and other outside social gatherings as it has plenty of power to push the sound. The quality of the sound is the best I have come across for ipod. The product is awesome, the sound is awesome,and oh yes, the price is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Renaldo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This box rocks. The bass response is fantastic. Great sound quality and well made. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: mighty sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe such a loud, full, bass-thumping sound is coming from this small unit. My friends keep looking around for the Sub-Woofer! But to say it is loud and thumpin'bass (which it is) tells only part of the story. The quality and balance of the sound tone is remarkable- closer to a studio monitor than a portable boombox. Add to this the ability to play and charge my iPod and this unit is a hands down winner !!
customer_reviews.author: musiclover

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed but the boombox will cut off if left out in the sun too long. Has great sound very portable and i like the ability to play with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: johnnie patterson

customer_reviews.title: Don't let its size fool you
customer_reviews.text: I've owned quite a few boom boxes over the years. This is by far the best sounding unit and it's nowhere near as large or heavy as some I've owned. I use this one during tennis practice, covering three indoor courts. Better sound and easier to carry than my much-larger, heavy JVC RVNB20B Kaboom.
customer_reviews.author: FREDon44

customer_reviews.title: Boombox Rox
customer_reviews.text: Had been wanting to get a portable Ipod soundsystem for a while, but could not find one that would give me the depth of bass and sound quality I was after. I am really pleased with my purchase of the Altec Lansing iMT810. Sound quality is great and the built in subwoofer really punches out the bass. The size of the unit allows me to take it anywhere and the price was just right. All in all couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Looeee

customer_reviews.title: Great base sound.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife but it's too much woofer sound. She doesn't like bass sound so I gave this one to my son. He likes it. I recommend iMT810 for teenagers who likes booming sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ko, Chong Bin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Radio sounds good but will not work with ac adapter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: boombox altec lansing
customer_reviews.text: great boombox for the garage or work, i thought it was a larger boombox. great sound, great boombox for anybody.
customer_reviews.author: VANI G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Powerfull and stylish at a affordable price! Fast shipping! I have been using it with a Belkin bluetooth connected to an AUX port, so I can stream my favorite songs from my ipad.Amazing buy!!,Nice combination
customer_reviews.author: Antonio J. C. Junior

customer_reviews.title: Zumba music
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the sound and especially the volume.I carry it to class in a duffle bag, making it portable enough for my purpose. ( Teaching Zumba at various locations ) I think it is a great value, most systems are more expensive and much less portable.
customer_reviews.author: ravingricki

customer_reviews.title: Boom
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Easy to use. Built in EQ will customize your sound to fit the room your playing in. Rock it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: great condition, best price. The sound isn't super high fidelity, but it is so good that it will surprise you
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Bose killer
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product it's a bose killer it's loud the base levels off after 30 out of 40 on the volume it still kick hard for it's side way the same sound quality as Bose just better because it has base and its cheaper the D batteries lasted more than a week of vacation all smiles no complaints so happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kjcran

customer_reviews.title: Great SOUND!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great BOOMBOX for inside and out!!! It fills a big room with quality sound and bass!! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angie/Chad

customer_reviews.title: big sound
customer_reviews.text: this unit is just what i wanted. it is quality built, works very well and i can use it with other devices (wifes nook).it took me awile to make up my mind between the ipod players but this one is real nice.
customer_reviews.author: bruce postma

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but wont work on batteries. Period.
customer_reviews.text: It will work for a while, then just stop. I have been bringing a deep cycle battery with a 750 watt inverter so I can pug in the AC adapter. I was hoping that they had read some of the reviews and fixed the problem, including clearing out bad stock. Very disappointed with the overall experience. but the sound will fill a beach areas occupied by about 20 people with plenty of bass so nobody can hear each other.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Munno

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Really was amazed at how great the sound was. Horn tweeters really shine with the high notes. Unfortunately within 2 months the display went dead so had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Crociata

customer_reviews.title: wow.
customer_reviews.text: We were having a little Thanksgiving day/night get together. Rocking out to good old 80's music. Good times for all-until my stereo died. End of party right? Not so since my Altec Boombox had arrived the day before. this thing rocks! The sound fills up the house in a big way. Party saver for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Old Moran

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful...Marvelous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a "To Go" system with my new IPhone4s. I wish it had a few more "Amps" in my place of work but overall I don't dare turn this up to full volume in my condo. It does everything it said it would and there are no lies! I would purchase this all over again.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Snider

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very good for this device. Radio works very good. Although pretty standard, the ipod dock could be better as far as accessibility and fit.
customer_reviews.author: R Pulley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is beyond anything I would expect from a boombox this size. It fills my room with magic even at mid-low volume. Also, it got delivered so fast!! I was told it was going to arrive April 5-10, 2012. It arrived 2 days earlier. Love this product and their dealers :) Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: EARL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just awesome. Great bass. Other people get jealous at my pool at how loud my speaker is.
customer_reviews.author: Sahib S. Dhindsa

customer_reviews.title: best sounding i pod dock
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mt810 , my sister fell in love with my first one so I gave it to her , several of my friends also ordered the mt800 for the same reason. Great base and clear sound .The only thing this box needs is rechargeable batteries (8 dc cells can get expensive).
customer_reviews.author: Luis E. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: just love it
customer_reviews.text: This bommbox was an alternative replacement to a Georges than died after less than a year of use. Easy to setup, easy to work. The sound is room filling and the base definitely present. It is actually also a good classical music solution. I removed one star for the unpracticality to plug/unplug the iphone in there, and the limited number of presets of the equalizer. But overall a highly recommended purchase to become a "ambiance" filler, or a plain room party box
customer_reviews.author: stef

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for parties
customer_reviews.text: This unit has great booming bass with easy controls. Everyone that hears the music is stunned when they see how small the box is compared to how big the sound is coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: works great and is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit for a while, works great and is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Boom box from amazon
customer_reviews.text: This system is great for outdoor functions and portable if necessary... I purchased it for a outdoor wedding and used my iPhone for the music... Worked very well.... Clear sound and loud enough for everyone to hear... Could be turned up loudder then I needed.. :)
customer_reviews.author: Altec from amazon

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: The amount of sound that comes out of the iMT810 is incredible. Deep bass nice highs. Its smaller than I thought which is great. Very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: It's a Great Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to look for a quality boom box---The base is great and the features are fantastic and pretty ruggid---I am on my second one because i got silly with beach sand on the first one.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Loved it while it lasted !
customer_reviews.text: Bought June 6th 2012 for 259.00 , Awesome for a year then suddenly no power , plugged in an alternate power supply and still no music. Also why are they 600.00 plus today ?
customer_reviews.author: ipaymyway

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding stereo
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They are truly incredible. They're as good as it gets, especially for the price. Worth every penny. Far better than Beats or any other.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was not sure about this product but now that I am using it, it is very good and I am thoroughly enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Sns

customer_reviews.title: Aztec Lansing IMT810
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound....distortion is negligible at full volume....would be nice if it held an iPad in the docking station but will attatched thru the earphone jack...great portable sound for a party on a boat or deck...well worth the dough!
customer_reviews.author: Gman

product_meta.title: Altec Lansing iMT810 Digital Boombox
product_meta.description:
The Altec Lansing MIX Digital Boombox Speaker System was developed for the "DJ lifestyle" -- for those people who know music and like to pick the playlist to liven their scene. Multiple people can jack in their iPhone, iPod or other music device, and the MIX lets you toggle between sources on-the-fly. The system is compatible with the iPhone 4 and features a 30-pin dock connector for the iPhone/iPod, in addition to two front-facing 3.5-millimeter jacks so everyone can enjoy their tunes.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Altec Lansing MIX Digital Boombox Speaker System was developed for the "DJ lifestyle" -- for those people who know music and like to pick the playlist to liven their scene. Multiple people can jack in their iPhone, iPod or other music device, and the MIX lets you toggle between sources on-the-fly. The system is compatible with the iPhone 4 and features a 30-pin dock connector for the iPhone/iPod, in addition to two front-facing 3.5-millimeter jacks so everyone can enjoy their tunes. The result? A party!



MIX iMT810 Digital Boombox
Speaker System
At a Glance: * Retro "Boombox" styling with advanced digital performance
   
   
 * Inputs for iPhone/iPod, and two additional aux-in jacks
   
   
 * Brightly lit LCD display for track information
   
   
 * Big natural bass, enhanced with XdB technology
   
   
 * AC and battery powered





Universal dock is compatible with both iPhone and iPod, and recharges while it plays your tunes. View larger.
Vibrant LED for adjusting EQ and displaying track information. View larger.Booming Stereo Sound
Of course, the combo of "DJ" and "party" requires loud and booming sound, and the MIX will deliver. Loaded with a 5.25-inch side-firing subwoofer and 5.25-inch tuned passive radiator, the MIX pumps out big natural bass, further enhanced with XdB technology for extra heavy punch. The sound is complete with a pair of 3-inch full-range drivers, a pair of 1-inch silk dome tweeters in a horn-loaded configuration. Beyond looking cool, the front-facing horns are engineered to disperse the high frequencies -- which are otherwise highly directional -- for great sound throughout the entire room. Quite frankly, the MIX gets loud.The MIX also features a brightly lit LCD display that tells you the track, artist and album being played from your docked iPhone or iPod. Also, FM station data is displayed when the radio is playing.




Fierce bass to keep the party thumping. View larger.Tailored EQ
The MIX has various EQ options that allow the user to tailor or personalize the sound. The simplest and most familiar is an adjustment of separate bass and treble controls. For more technical tuning, a digital 7-band graphic equalizer allows custom cutting or boosting of specific frequencies. Or, there are four EQ presets where just a touch of a button will tune the EQ for specific music genres, either for rock, pop, hip-hop or simply flat.FM Radio Tuner
For entertainment beyond the iPhone and iPod, the MIX has an FM radio tuner with four station pre-sets.

Moves with the Party
True to its retro boombox roots, the MIX runs on AC or battery power. You'll always know how much battery life you have because the MIX will tell you on its display. You can expect up to 30 hours of play with eight "D" sized batteries. And, the MIX has nicely weight-balanced handles so you can take it on the road or around the house just as easily.

Thoughtfully Designed Remote Control
Between parties the remote control stows away in its own cubby so it can always be easily found. At party time, use the clip-on carabineer so the remote is always handy to command the jams. The remote allows you to toggle between all of your music sources, including the FM radio and lets you control the on/off power, volume minus, volume plus, track back, track forward, EQ, play/pause, and the four preset buttons. The four preset buttons are used for both the FM preset mode and the EQ preset mode.

Compatible with iPhone and iPod
The MIX is compatible with a wide range of iPod players, including iPod touch (1G through 4G), iPod classic, iPod with video, iPod nano (1G through 6G ), and iPhone (1G through 4G).

The MIX is covered by a one-year limited warranty.

What's in the Box
MIX stereo speaker system, remote control, AC power adapter, two (2) 3.5-millimeter connection cables, Apple universal well inserts, and user's guide.
